Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually walking along Nagaritha Drive, south of the Grape Orchard.
Room.LongDescription: The Circle-Bar Butcher is located on the south side of the road, providing meats of various cuts from their ranch to the general public. On the north side of the road is the Chateau Richland Grape Orchard, where, as one would guess, grapes are grown and harvested. The grapes are then pressed and fermented into wine.
